Upload File for Notes

Upload your documents and convert them into organized, searchable notes.

Supported file types:

  • PDF files - Documents, research papers, articles
  • Word documents - .doc and .docx files
  • Text files - .txt files with plain text

💡 Want PowerPoint support? Upgrade to Student or Pro plan to upload presentations.

Tip: For best results, ensure your file contains clear, readable text.

Give your notes a descriptive title to help you find them later
